title: El Encuentro - Tigre
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Peruvian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. One of three EL Encuentro restaurants in Cusco, this offers a range of vegetarian, vegan, and pescatarian (fish) meals including tofu burger, pancakes, spaghetti, salads, french fries, falafels, whole wheat bread, cocktails and juices. Complimentary salad bar with meal. Nice atmosphere, quick service. Weekday movie afternoons from 3-6pm.
